contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses}} {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Sator'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | subphylum = [[Vertebrata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | subordo = [[Lacertilia]] | infraordo = [[Iguania]] | familia = [[Phrynosomatidae]] | genus = '''''Sator''''' | genus_authority = [[Mary Cynthia Dickerson|Dickerson]], 1919<ref>Wikispecies</ref> }} The [[genus]] '''''Sator''''' contains two [[species]] of spiny lizards [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Baja California]], [[Mexico]].<ref>Dickerson, M.C. 1919. Diagnoses of twenty-three new species and a new genus of lizards from Lower California. Bull. Amer. Mus. Nat. Hist. 41(10):461-477.</ref> ==Species== *''[[Sceloporus angustus|Sator angustus]]'' [[Mary Cynthia Dickerson|Dickerson]], 1919 *''[[Sator grandaevus]]'' [[Mary Cynthia Dickerson|Dickerson]], 1919 ==Taxonomy== The genus ''Sator'' was synonymized with the genus ''[[Sceloporus]]'' by Bell et al. in 2003.<ref>The Reptile Database. www.reptile-database.org.</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Phrynosomatids]] {{Lizard-stub}}
